description: This configuration specifies for each FHIR custom import project all project-specific necessary properties. The configuration can be changed during runtime.

writeTransformedBundleToFileSystem.description: If true, the transformed Bundles will be written to file system. Helpful for debugging.

transformedBundleFolder.description: The base path in which the transformed bundles will be written.

sourceBundleFolder.description: The base path in which the source bundles will be written.

writeSourceBundleToFileSystem.description: If true, the source Bundles will be written to file system. Helpful for debugging.
